archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection consists of a paper by Anne H. Giles titled, "Interviews with Women Graduates of Virginia Tech."

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Anne H. Giles Paper must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Anne H. Giles Paper, Ms1983-010 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Anne H. Giles Paper was donated to Special Collections in 1983.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Anne H. Giles Paper commenced and was completed in 1983. Additional description was completed in June 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: No biographical information is available. The paper was written for a graduate-level education course.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a paper by Anne H. Giles titled, "Interviews with Women Graduates of Virginia Tech." The paper, written for a presents portions of interviews of nine Virginia Tech graduates from 1953 to 1966. Several interviewees went on to work for Virginia Tech, including Lucy Lee Lancaster, Laura Jane Harper, and Dorothy Bodell.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
